attributes.action: Vote to get rid of the monarchy
attributes.additional_details: I feel like it’s a old thing and it’s past it now feel like we would be better off without one
attributes.background: Get rid of the monarchy and make sure there money goes to helping others that need it not like if we keep the king will sit and just get richer and richer

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Hold a referendum on replacing the monarchy with an elected head of state
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655992
